column5: Hit a massive ditch while towing the boat back. Uneven trailer axle made the brake on the outside wheel unaligned. Was driving with smokes and sparks until warned by other friendly motorists.  Need a reliable repair shop as soon as possible.  Any recommendation? My boat is parked near Bloomington and HWY404, with the broken brake I don't think I can go very far.  Thanks

Look up any trailer sales/repair place in the area.  If they specialize in trailers a boat trailer should be no problem.  We have a place here in Bolton called Via trailers, but no idea about the Newmarket, Aurora area.
King City Trailers.  On King Rd. in between Bathurst and Dufferin 905.773.4260
Brampton Truck and Trailer 905 791-6366 Mannys a great guy to deal with and an avid fisherman to boot.
what happend with the one I told you about?
GBW, they never called me back when I left a message. I end up going to King City Trailers, thank you Peps!  They said I might get it as soon as Friday, fingers crossed!  Thanks for all your help.
